titles.title: A bill to require review by the Government Accountability Office of screening protocols of the Transportation Security Administration relating to breast milk and formula, and for other purposes.
Traveling Parents Screening Consistency Act of 2019
Traveling Parents Screening Consistency Act of 2019
Traveling Parents Screening Consistency Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Traveling Parents Screening Consistency Act of 2019
This bill directs the Government Accountability Office to review implementation of requirements regarding screening by the Transportation Security Administration of baby formula, breast milk, purified deionized water for infants, and juice on airlines.
